Description: Granodiorite statue of Sekhmet, holding papyrus-sceptre and ankh, lower section missing.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1993-2003, Newcastle, The Hancock Museum, Land of the Pharaohs 2006/8 Sept-Sept, Wallsend, Segedunum Roman Fort & Baths Museum, Egypt Revealed 2009 May-present, Newcastle, Great North Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
